Text: hey there. can you add tags or whatever to this torrent for searching and stuff, ie minus the fullstops. toook me waaaay too long to find this torrent. but thanks for the upload. cheers

I had a bit of a hard time, too, finding the first episode from the main TPB page.  BUT if you go to Google and type in, "The Almighty Johnsons torrent", this is the first link that popped up.  I use this trick a lot, if I cannot find it directly on the front page of the Pirate Bay.

Thanks, TVTeam!  You've done it again.  :)

Lots of Peace, Unity, Love, and Light to everyone.
